skill.name: Frenzy
skill.description:
Generate: 3 Fury per attack

Swing for 110% weapon damage. Frenzy attack speed increases by 15% with each swing. This effect can stack up to 5 times for a total bonus of 75% attack speed.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 3 Fury per attack

Enter a frenzied state that increases your attack speed with each hit.

rune.name: Sidearm
rune.description: Each strike has a 25% chance to throw a piercing axe at a nearby enemy that deals 110% weapon damage to all enemies in its path.
rune.simpleDescription: Each attack has a chance to throw a piercing axe.

skill.name: War Cry
skill.description:
Generate: 30 Fury
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Unleash a rallying cry to increase Armor for you and all allies within 50 yards by 20% for 60 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 30 Fury
Cooldown: 30 seconds

A rallying cry increases Armor for you and your allies for 60 seconds.

rune.name: Impunity
rune.description: All of your resistances are increased by 50% while affected by War Cry.
rune.simpleDescription: War Cry increases your ability to resist damage of all types.

skill.name: Rend
skill.description:
Cost: 20 Fury

A sweeping strike causes all nearby enemies to Bleed for 700% weapon damage as Physical over 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 20 Fury

Wound nearby enemies and cause them to Bleed for 5 seconds.

rune.name: Blood Lust
rune.description: Gain 9% of the damage done by Rend as Life.
rune.simpleDescription: Gain Life when you damage enemies with Rend.

skill.name: Revenge
skill.description:
Revenge has a 15% chance to become active each time you are hit.

Inflict 220% weapon damage to all nearby enemies. You heal 5.0% of your maximum Life for each enemy hit.
skill.simpleDescription:
Release a retaliatory attack that heals you with each enemy hit.

Revenge has a chance to become available when you are hit.

rune.name: Provocation
rune.description: Increases the chance Revenge will become active to 30% each time you are hit by an attack.
rune.simpleDescription: Increase the chance for Revenge to become active.

skill.name: Wrath of the Berserker
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Fury 
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Enter a berserker rage which raises several attributes for 15 seconds.

Critical Hit Chance: 10%
Attack Speed: 25%
Dodge Chance: 20%
Movement Speed: 20%
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Fury 
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Become Fury incarnate for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Insanity
rune.description: While active your damage is also increased by 100%.
rune.simpleDescription: Increase your damage while Wrath of the Berserker is active.

skill.name: Ignore Pain
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Reduces all damage taken by 65% for 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Your rage protects you from most damage for a limited time.

rune.name: Ignorance is Bliss
rune.description: While Ignore Pain is active, gain 20% of all damage dealt as Life.
rune.simpleDescription: While Ignore Pain is active, gain Life for damage dealt to enemies.

skill.name: Ruthless
skill.description:
Critical Hit Chance increased by 5%. Critical Hit Damage increased by 50%.

Many skills and runes rely on Critical Hits to trigger their effects.
skill.flavor: The clans each paint their warriors in their own unique way. Some celebrate the mountain, others honor the fire, but the Targos clan worships the purifying virtue of pain.

skill.name: Superstition
skill.description: Reduces all non-Physical damage by 20%. Whenever you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack, you have a chance to gain 3 Fury.
skill.flavor: "The sorcery of the west has brought us nothing but blight. Strength built these walls, and strength will hold them." â€”Gruchac Hammerhand

skill.name: Tough as Nails
skill.description:
Increases Armor by 25%.
Thorns damage dealt increased by 50%.
skill.flavor: After a while, the scars serve as their own layer of armor.

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Heals you or the Templar for 4651 Life.

Cooldown: 30 seconds

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 155 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Charges a target, dealing 50% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: 30 seconds
skill.simpleDescription: Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning the target.

skill.name: Guardian
skill.description:
Rush to the aid of wounded ally, knocking back enemies within 15 yards and healing the wounded ally for 4651 Life.

Cooldown: 30 seconds
skill.simpleDescription: When hero Life is low, the Templar will come to your aid, knocking back nearby enemies and healing you.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Ranged attack that slows the target by 60% for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 6 seconds
skill.simpleDescription: Deals damage and slows the target.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Blinds enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 30 seconds

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Powerful ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 25% weapon damage as Arcane to targets within 6 yards and has a 50% chance to Stun targets for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: 20 seconds
skill.simpleDescription: Deals massive damage in an area and knocks back enemies.

skill.name: Hysteria
skill.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 10% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.

skill.name: Forceful Push
skill.description:
Summon an Arcane explosion 8 yards around an enemy, dealing 100% weapon damage as Arcane and knocking back all monsters caught within it.

Cooldown: 10 seconds
skill.simpleDescription: Creates an explosion that deals massive damage and knocks back enemies.
